tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id UUID, customer_name STRING, customer_email STRING)
CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id UUID, transaction_type STRING, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE deposits (
  deposit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  deposit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE withdrawals (
  withdrawal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  withdrawal_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE deposits (
    deposit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    deposit_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE withdrawals (
    withdrawal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    withdrawal_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transfers (
    transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transfers (
    transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_account_id INT,
    to_account_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    date TIMESTAMP
);
